MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Northfield Grove and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30pm to complete the final repairs on a faulty underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:50pm on Tuesday, 27 April 2021
